thread.section_title: Finance News | Sharecast - Yahoo! UK & Ireland Finance
thread.title: Thursday broker round-up

title: Thursday broker round-up
text:
4.40 0.00 
  Tullow Oil (LSE: TLW.L - news ) : JP Morgan Cazenove upgrades to overweight, cuts target price to 310.00p. Soco International (LSE: SIA.L - news ) : UBS (NYSEArca: FBGX - news ) downgrades to sell, keeps target price at 150.00p. 
Synthomer (Other OTC: SYHMY - news ) : Berenberg Bank starts new coverage with a buy, sets target price at 400.00p. 
Weir Group (Other OTC: WEIGF - news ) : Investec Securities downgrades to sell, lowers target price to 1120.00p. 
Laird (Other OTC: LARRF - news ) : Investec Securities upgrades to hold, raises target price to 405.00p. 
IMI (LSE: IMI.L - news ) : Investec Securities upgrades to buy, bumps up target price to 1130.00p. 
Firstgroup (LSE: FGP.L - news ) : UBS upgrades to neutral, lowers target price to 108.00p. 
Spectris (Other OTC: SEPJF - news ) : Investec Securities downgrades to hold, bumps down target price to 1810.00p. 
Vesuvius (Other OTC: CKSNF - news ) : Investec Securities downgrades to sell, cuts target price to 330.00p. 
Standard Chartered (HKSE: 2888.HK - news ) : Goldman Sachs (NYSE: GS-PB - news ) upgrades to buy. Target (NYSE: TGT - news ) price: 910.00p. 
Cable & Wireless Communication: RBC Capital Markets starts new coverage with an outperform, sets target price at 76.00p. 
Virgin Money Holdings (uk): Shore Capital starts new coverage with a hold. 
Poundland Group (Other OTC: PDLDF - news ) : JP Morgan Cazenove restarts coverage with an overweight, sets target price at 350.00p. 
Just Retirement Group: RBC Capital Markets upgrades to outperform, bumps up target price to 200.00p. 
Sports Direct International (Other OTC: SDIPF - news ) : Nomura downgrades to sector perform, cuts target price to 850.00p. 
Informa (Other OTC: IFJPY - news ) : Deustche upgrades to buy, raises target price to 680.00p. 
Shaftesbury (Stuttgart: OVW.SG - news ) : HSBC upgrades to hold, bumps up target price to 902.00p. 
Fidessa Group (Other OTC: FDGRF - news ) : UBS upgrades to buy, reduces target price to 2030.00p. 
Hammerson (Other OTC: HMSNF - news ) : HSBC upgrades to buy, lowers target price to 677.00p. 
Sabmiller (Xetra: BRW1.DE - news ) : Shore Capital downgrades hold. UBS reiterates to neutral and keeps target to 3750p.
